markdownRemark.html: We create websites and web apps of high quality that are highly responsive and user friendly using one of the best and fastest mobile technologies, React Native MERN stack(MongoDB, Express, React and Node), Gatsby and Vite which is utilised in most upcoming industries

node.data: {"Home":"Ụlọ","Contact":"Kpọtụrụ","View All Services":"Lelee ọrụ niile","Innovating African businesses":"Na-emepe emepe azụmahịa Africa","We are a Software Development Company, primarily focused on Frontend Web Development.":"Anyị bụ ụlọ ọrụ mmepe Software, lekwasịrị anya na Frontend Web Development.","Phone 1":"Ekwentị 1","Phone 2":"Ekwentị 2","Email":"Email","About":"Ihe gbasara","Pricing":"Ịnye ọnụ ahịa","Team":"Otu","Who we are":"Onye anyi bu","Pricing built for businesses of all sizes":"Ewubere ọnụahịa maka azụmaahịa nke nha niile","Our team of Engineers":"Ndị otu injinia anyị","ABOUT":"GABATARA","PRICING":"Ọnụ ahịa","TEAM":"Otu","Our Services":"Ọrụ anyị","Artificial Intelligence":"Amamịghe echiche","Data Science":"Sayensị data","Machine Learning":"Ịmụ igwe","Mobile Development":"Mmepe mkpanaka","Web Design/Development":"Nhazi/mmepe webụ","Our AI Team focuses on writing algorithms and leveraging on existing one to maximise human efficiency in business and home at large":"Ndị otu AI anyị na-elekwasị anya n'ịde algọridim na itinye aka na nke dị ugbu a iji bulie arụmọrụ mmadụ na azụmaahịa na ụlọ buru ibu.","Our team of engineers deeply explore data and ways to record, store and analyze data to extract useful information and our end goal is to gain insights and knowledge from any type of data both structured and unstructured":"Ndị ọrụ injinia anyị na-enyocha nke ọma data na ụzọ ha ga-esi dekọọ, chekwaa na nyochaa data iji wepụta ozi bara uru na ebumnuche njedebe anyị bụ inweta nghọta na ihe ọmụma sitere na ụdị data ọ bụla a haziri ahazi na nke edobereghị ya.","Here at Team ML we focus on making use of AI algorithms by providing sytems the ability to automatically learn and in improve from experience without being explicitly programmed, we also focus on the development of computer programs that can access data and use it to learn for themselves":"N'ebe a na Team ML, anyị na-elekwasị anya n'iji AI algọridim eme ihe site n'inye usoro ikike ịmụta ihe na-akpaghị aka na imeziwanye site na ahụmahụ na-enweghị usoro nke ọma, anyị na-elekwasị anya na mmepe nke mmemme kọmputa nke nwere ike ịnweta data ma jiri ya mụta maka onwe ha.","For mobile development we utilise (React Native) which is a Mobile App Development Framework that enables the development of multi-platform Android and iOS apps using native UI elements":"Maka mmepe mkpanaka anyị na-eji (React Native) nke bụ usoro mmepe ngwa mkpanaaka nke na-enyere mmepe nke ọtụtụ ngwa gam akporo na iOS site na iji ihe UI ala.","We create websites and web apps of high quality that are highly responsive and user friendly using one of the best and fastest mobile technologies, React Native MERN stack(MongoDB, Express, React and Node), Gatsby and Vite which is utilised in most upcoming industries":"Anyị na-emepụta webụsaịtị na ngwa weebụ dị elu nke na-anabata nke ọma yana enyi na enyi site na iji otu teknụzụ mkpanaka kacha mma na ngwa ngwa, React Native MERN stack(MongoDB, Express, React na Node), Gatsby na Vite nke a na-eji n'ọtụtụ ụlọ ọrụ na-abịa.","Your vision is built with":"Eji wuo ọhụụ gị","GATSBY":"GATSBY","Gatsby.js, a popular open-source framework for building modern web applications. Gatsby.js is based on React and uses GraphQL to pull data from various sources to generate static websites":"Gatsby.js, isi mmalite mepere emepe ewu ewu maka iwulite ngwa weebụ ọgbara ọhụrụ. ","NEST":"Akwu","NestJS is a framework for building scalable and efficient server-side applications. It is often used to develop web applications, APIs, and microservices using TypeScript or JavaScript. NestJS is built with a modular and extensible architecture and draws inspiration from Angular, which makes it familiar to developers who have experience with Angular":"NestJS bụ usoro maka iwulite ngwa n'akụkụ ihe nkesa na nke ọma. ","VITE":"VITE","Vite is a build tool and development server that is designed to optimize the development experience for modern web applications, particularly those using frameworks like React, Vue, and others. Vite is known for its fast startup time and efficient development workflow.":"Vite bụ ihe nrụpụta na ihe nkesa mmepe emebere iji bulie ahụmịhe mmepe maka ngwa weebụ ọgbara ọhụrụ, ọkachasị ndị na-eji usoro dị ka React, Vue na ndị ọzọ. ","REACT":"MARA","React, also known as React.js or ReactJS, is an open-source JavaScript library for building user interfaces or UI components. It was developed by Facebook and is widely used for creating interactive and dynamic user interfaces in web applications. React allows developers to build reusable UI components, making it easier to manage and update complex user interfaces.":"React, nke a makwaara dị ka React.js ma ọ bụ ReactJS, bụ ọbá akwụkwọ Javascript mepere emepe maka iwu oghere ndị ọrụ ma ọ bụ ihe UI. ","REACT NATIVE":"MERE EZIOKWU","React Native is an open-source framework developed by Facebook that allows developers to build mobile applications using JavaScript and React. With React Native, you can create cross-platform mobile apps that run on both iOS and Android platforms while sharing a significant portion of the codebase. This enables developers to use their web development skills to build native mobile applications.":"React Native bụ usoro mepere emepe nke Facebook mepụtara nke na-enye ndị mmepe ohere iji Javascript na React wuo ngwa mkpanaka. ","JAVASCRIPT":"JAVASCRIPT","JavaScript is a high-level, versatile, and interpreted programming language primarily known for its role in web development. It is commonly used to add interactivity, dynamic content, and behavior to websites. JavaScript is one of the core technologies of the World Wide Web, alongside HTML and CSS.":"Javascript bụ asụsụ mmemme nwere ọkwa dị elu, nke na-atụgharị ya nke ọma maka ọrụ ya na mmepe webụ. ","HTML 5":"HTML 5","HTML5, the fifth and latest version of the Hypertext Markup Language, is a standard markup language for structuring and presenting content on the World Wide Web. HTML5 was officially released as a W3C Recommendation in October 2014, and it brings several new features and improvements over its predecessor, HTML4.":"HTML5, ụdị nke ise na nke ọhụrụ nke Hypertext Markup Language, bụ asụsụ akara akara maka ịhazi na iwepụta ọdịnaya na Weebụ World Wide. ","CSS 3":"CSS 3","CSS (Cascading Style Sheets) is a style sheet language used for describing the look and formatting of a document written in HTML or XML. CSS3 is the latest version of CSS, bringing new features, enhancements, and capabilities to the language. CSS3 builds upon the foundation of CSS2 and introduces several advanced styling options and techniques. ":"CSS (Cascading Style Sheets) bụ ụdị mpempe akwụkwọ eji akọwa ọdịdị na nhazi nke akwụkwọ edere na HTML ma ọ bụ XML.  ","GRAPHQL":"GRAPHQL","GraphQL is a query language and runtime for APIs (Application Programming Interfaces) that was developed by Facebook. It provides a more efficient, powerful, and flexible alternative to traditional REST APIs. GraphQL allows clients to request only the data they need and receive a predictable, structured response, making it well-suited for building modern web and mobile applications":"GraphQL bụ asụsụ a na-ajụ ajụjụ na oge ọsọ maka API (Ngwa Ngwa Mmemme) nke Facebook mepụtara. ","SASS":"SASS","Sass, which stands for Syntactically Awesome Stylesheets, is a preprocessor scripting language that is interpreted or compiled into Cascading Style Sheets (CSS). SassScript is the scripting language itself. It provides mechanisms such as variables, nested rules, and mixins, making CSS more maintainable and easier to write.":"Sass, nke na-anọchi anya Syntactically Awesome Stylesheets, bụ asụsụ edemede nke na-aga n'ihu nke a tụgharịrị ma ọ bụ chịkọta ya na mpempe akwụkwọ Cascading Style (CSS). ","R":"R","R is a programming language and free software environment specifically designed for statistical computing and graphics. It is widely used by statisticians, data scientists, researchers, and analysts for tasks such as data analysis, statistical modeling, visualization, and machine learning. R provides a comprehensive set of tools for working with data, and it has a large and active community that contributes to its packages and ecosystem.":"R bụ asụsụ mmemme yana gburugburu sọftụwia efu emebere maka kọmpụta mgbakọ na mwepụ na eserese. ","PYTHON":"Python","Python is a high-level, versatile, and interpreted programming language known for its readability and ease of use. It supports multiple programming paradigms, including procedural, object-oriented, and functional programming. Python has become one of the most popular programming languages, used in various domains such as web development, data science, artificial intelligence, scientific computing, automation, and more.":"Eke Ọgba bụ asụsụ mmemme nwere ọkwa dị elu, nke na-atụgharị ya nke ọma maka ịgụ ya na ịdị mfe iji ya. ","MONGO DB":"MONGO DB","MongoDB is a cross-platform, document-oriented NoSQL (Not Only SQL) database program. It falls under the category of NoSQL databases because it does not use the traditional relational database management system (RDBMS) structure. Instead, MongoDB stores data in flexible, JSON-like documents known as BSON (Binary JSON) that can vary in structure, allowing for a dynamic and scalable approach to data storage.":"MongoDB bụ usoro nchekwa data NoSQL (Ọ bụghị naanị SQL) dabere na akwụkwọ. ","NODE JS":"NODE JS","Node.js is an open-source, cross-platform JavaScript runtime environment that allows developers to execute server-side JavaScript code. It is built on the V8 JavaScript runtime engine, which is the same engine that powers the Google Chrome browser. Node.js enables the development of scalable and high-performance web applications by using an event-driven, non-blocking I/O model.":"Node.js bụ ebe mepere emepe, ebe a na-agafe agafe Javascript nke na-enye ndị mmepe ohere ịme koodu Javascript n'akụkụ sava. ","ANGULAR":"ANGULAR","Angular is a popular open-source web application framework developed and maintained by Google. It is written in TypeScript and allows developers to build dynamic, single-page web applications (SPAs) with a focus on creating a modular and maintainable codebase. Angular provides a comprehensive set of features for building modern, client-side web applications.":"Angular bụ usoro ngwa weebụ mepere emepe ama ama nke Google mepụtara ma na-edobe ya. ","NPM":"NPM","NPM stands for Node Package Manager, and it is the default package manager for Node.js, a JavaScript runtime environment. NPM is used to manage and distribute packages (libraries and tools) written in JavaScript and intended for use with Node.js.":"NPM na-anọchi anya Node Package Manager, ọ bụkwa onye njikwa ngwungwu ndabara maka Node.js, gburugburu oge ọsọ Javascript. ","GITHUB":"GITHUB","GitHub is a web-based platform that provides a centralized repository hosting service for version control using Git. It is widely used by developers and teams to collaboratively work on software projects, track changes, and manage code repositories. GitHub offers a range of features to support collaboration, code review, issue tracking, and continuous integration.":"GitHub bụ ikpo okwu dabere na webụ nke na-enye ọrụ nnabata ebe nchekwa maka njikwa ụdị site na iji Git. ","FIGMA":"FIGMA","Figma is a cloud-based design and prototyping tool that enables collaborative interface design and user experience (UI/UX) prototyping. It is commonly used by designers, developers, and teams to create, share, and iterate on designs in real-time. Figma's key feature is its cloud-based platform, which allows multiple users to collaborate on design projects simultaneously, fostering a seamless and efficient design process.":"Figma bụ ihe eji eme igwe ojii na ihe nlere anya nke na-enyere aka imekọ ihe ọnụ na ahụmịhe onye ọrụ (UI/UX). ","ADOBE ILLUSTRATOR":"ADOBE ILUSTRATOR","Adobe Illustrator is a vector graphics editor developed and marketed by Adobe Inc. It is part of the Adobe Creative Cloud suite of design software, which also includes applications like Photoshop, InDesign, and Premiere Pro. Illustrator is widely used by graphic designers, illustrators, and artists to create scalable vector graphics for print and digital media.":"Adobe Illustrator bụ vector ndịna-emeputa ihe nleba anya nke Adobe Inc na-ere ahịa. Ọ bụ akụkụ nke Adobe Creative Cloud suite nke ngwanrọ imewe, nke gụnyekwara ngwa dị ka Photoshop, InDesign, na Premiere Pro. ","ADOBE PHOTOSHOP":"ADOBE PHOTOSHOP","Adobe Photoshop is a powerful raster graphics editor developed and published by Adobe Inc. It is widely used by designers, photographers, and artists for image editing, retouching, digital painting, and graphic design. Photoshop is a part of the Adobe Creative Cloud suite and is known for its extensive range of features and capabilities.":"Adobe Photoshop bụ onye nchịkọta akụkọ eserese raster dị ike mepụtara ma bipụta ya bụ Adobe Inc. Ndị na-emepụta ihe, ndị na-ese foto na ndị na-ese ihe na-eji ya eme ihe n'ọtụtụ ebe maka ndezi ihe onyonyo, imegharị, eserese dijitalụ na imewe eserese. ","LINUX":"LINUX","Linux is an open-source, Unix-like operating system kernel that serves as the foundation for a variety of free and open-source operating systems. It was created by Linus Torvalds in 1991 as a hobby project, and it quickly became a popular choice for operating systems due to its stability, security, and flexibility. Linux is known for its use in servers, embedded systems, and as an alternative operating system for personal computers.":"Linux bụ ihe mepere emepe, kernel sistemụ dị ka Unix nke na-arụ ọrụ dị ka ntọala maka sistemụ arụmọrụ n'efu na nke mepere emepe. ","SUBLIME IDE":"IDE SUBULIME","'Sublime Text is a sophisticated and widely used text editor, not an Integrated Development Environment (IDE). It is known for its speed, simplicity, and extensive plugin ecosystem. While Sublime Text provides many features commonly associated with IDEs, it lacks certain integrated tools specific to particular programming languages.":"Ederede dị elu bụ ọkaibe na ndezi ederede a na-ejikarị eme ihe, ọ bụghị Integrated Development Environment (IDE). ","NETLIFY":"NETLIFY","Netlify is a cloud platform that provides a range of services for building, deploying, and managing modern web projects. It is particularly known for its simplicity, automation, and integration with popular static site generators and modern web development workflows. Netlify supports both static and serverless (function-as-a-service) architectures, making it a popular choice for web developers and teams.":"Netlify bụ ikpo okwu igwe ojii nke na-enye ọrụ dị iche iche maka iwulite, ibugharị, na ijikwa ọrụ weebụ ọgbara ọhụrụ. ","TABLEAU":"TABLEAU","Tableau is a powerful data visualization and business intelligence (BI) platform that enables users to connect to, visualize, and share insights from their data. It allows individuals and organizations to create interactive and dynamic dashboards, reports, and visualizations to gain valuable insights into their data.":"Tableau bụ nhụta data siri ike yana ikpo okwu ọgụgụ isi azụmaahịa (BI) nke na-enyere ndị ọrụ aka ijikọ, were anya ya na ịkekọrịta nghọta sitere na data ha. ","VS CODE":"Koodu VS","Visual Studio Code (VS Code) is a free and open-source source code editor developed by Microsoft. It is lightweight, highly customizable, and supports a wide range of programming languages and extensions. VS Code is designed to provide developers with a productive environment for coding, debugging, and version control, making it one of the most popular code editors in the developer community.":"Visual Studio Code (VS Code) bụ ndezi koodu isi mmalite mepere emepe nke Microsoft mepụtara. ","RAPID MINER":"Onye na-egwuputa ihe ngwa ngwa","RapidMiner is a data science platform that provides an integrated environment for end-to-end data science and machine learning processes. It allows users to perform tasks such as data preparation, machine learning modeling, and deployment of predictive models. RapidMiner is designed to be user-friendly, making it accessible to a wide range of users, including data scientists, analysts, and business professionals.":"RapidMiner bụ ikpo okwu sayensị data nke na-enye gburugburu agbakwunyere maka sayensị data njedebe na njedebe na usoro mmụta igwe. ","Our Features":"Atụmatụ anyị","Website Maintenance":"Nlekọta weebụsaịtị","Web Design, Web Development, Mobile App Design and Mobile App Development":"Nhazi Weebụ, Mmepe Weebụ, Nhazi ngwa mkpanaaka na mmepe ngwa mkpanaaka","AI, ML and Data Science Consultation":"AI, ML na Data Science Consultation","We ensure the websites of our clients' is well maintained as we stay in touch with them":"Anyị na-ahụ na a na-echekwa weebụsaịtị nke ndị ahịa anyị nke ọma ka anyị na ha na-akpakọrịta","We design and develop with cutting edge technologies":"Anyị na-eji teknụzụ na-emepe emepe ma na-emepe emepe","We provide Artificial Intelligence, Machine Learning and Data Science consultations":"Anyị na-enye ọgụgụ isi Artificial, mmụta igwe na ndụmọdụ sayensị data","Price comparison Table":"Tebụl ntụnyere ọnụahịa","Pricing Built For Businesses Of All Sizes":"Ọnụ ahịa Ewuru Maka Azụmahịa N'ụdị Niile","Before building a website for your business, it is important to know the costs involved. This will ensure you budget adequately for the project. Some business owners think building a website is a one-off thing. You just build it and you go to sleep. However, there are fixed costs and recurrent costs involved in building a business website":"Tupu iwulite webụsaịtị maka azụmahịa gị, ọ dị mkpa ịmara ego ọ na-efu. ","Features":"Atụmatụ","Basic Plan (Suitable for Budget Applications) - ₦500,000+":"Atụmatụ bụ isi ( Kwesịrị ekwesị maka ngwa mmefu ego) - ₦ 500,000","Pro Plan (Suitable for Medium to Enterprise Applications) - ₦1million+":"Atụmatụ Pro ( Kwesịrị ekwesị maka Ngwa Ọkara na Ụlọ Ọrụ) - ₦ 1million","Integration of Social Media":"Mmekọrịta nke Social Media","Get found on social media":"Chọta na mgbasa ozi ọha","If your site has a login or accepts form submissions, HTTPS is essential for your users’ security and privacy. Google search results prioritize sites with HTTPS enabled":"Ọ bụrụ na saịtị gị nwere nbanye ma ọ bụ nabata ntinye akwụkwọ, HTTPS dị mkpa maka nchekwa na nzuzo nke ndị ọrụ gị. ","Hosting fee is free":"Ego nnabata bụ n'efu","Would you love to create, manage, and modify content on your website without the need for our specialized technical knowledge":"Ọ ga-amasị gị ịmepụta, jikwaa na gbanwee ọdịnaya na webụsaịtị gị na-enweghị mkpa maka nka nka pụrụiche anyị","Register a custom address like www.YourBusinessOrName.com to your website or online store":"Debanye aha adreesị omenala dị ka www.YourBusinessOrName.com na webụsaịtị gị ma ọ bụ ụlọ ahịa dị n'ịntanetị","Netlify build bots do it by parsing your HTML files directly at deploy time, so there’s no need for us to make an API call or include extra JavaScript on your site":"Netlify na-ewu bots na-eme ya site n'ịtụle faịlụ HTML gị ozugbo n'oge a na-ebuga ya, yabụ na ọ dịghị mkpa ka anyị kpọọ oku API ma ọ bụ tinye Javascript ọzọ na saịtị gị.","Friendly Forkhive Guides are standing by to answer your questions. Call +234 913 863 6045":"Ntuziaka Forkhive enyi na enyi na-eguzo n'akụkụ ịza ajụjụ gị. ","You can book one-time, recurring appointments, a webinar, class, workshop, in-person or virtual event directly from your website and Remind customers of their upcoming bookings":"Ị nwere ike ide akwụkwọ otu oge, nhọpụta ugboro ugboro, webinar, klaasị, nkuzi, mmadụ ma ọ bụ mmemme mebere ozugbo site na webụsaịtị gị wee chetara ndị ahịa akwụkwọ ntinye akwụkwọ na-abịa.","Accept credit card, Paystack, Flutterwave, Interswitch Webpay, Paypal, Amplify and Remita payments for products/orders. Transaction fees are dependent on your selected payment processor. We don’t charge additional fees and, with Paystack, offer one of the lowest transaction fees (Local Cards: 1.5% + 100NGN, International Cards: 3.9% + NGN, 100 NGN 100 fee is waived for transactions less than NGN 2500) compared to similar ecommerce plans":"Nabata kaadị kredit, Paystack, Flutterwave, Interswitch Webpay, Paypal, Amplify na Remita ịkwụ ụgwọ maka ngwaahịa/iwu. ","Does your website require database integration let us know":"Webụsaịtị gị ọ chọrọ njikọta nchekwa data mee ka anyị mara","If someone loads pages of your site on multiple different days, they will be counted as a unique visitor for each day. If someone loads pages of your site during multiple different hours, they will  be counted as a unique visitor for each hour. You could be watching  this metric":"Ọ bụrụ na mmadụ buru ibe saịtị gị n'ọtụtụ ụbọchị dị iche iche, a ga-agụta ya dị ka onye ọbịa pụrụ iche maka ụbọchị ọ bụla. ","Get found on Google and other search engines with help Gatsby or Netlify":"Chọta na Google na ngwa nchọta ndị ọzọ site na enyemaka Gatsby ma ọ bụ Netlify","₦500,000+":"₦500,000","in addition to":"na mgbakwunye na","recurrent costs":"na-akwụ ụgwọ ugboro ugboro","Note":"Rịba ama","Prices are subject to the complexity of the project and nature of the market":"Ọnụ ahịa dị n'okpuru mgbagwoju anya nke oru ngo na ọdịdị nke ahịa ahụ","₦1million":"₦1million","Hire Us":"Kpọọ Anyị","SSL/TLS Certificate":"Asambodo SSL/TLS","Hosting Fee":"Ụgwọ nnabata","CMS (Content Management System)":"CMS (Sistemụ Njikwa Ọdịnaya)","Custom Domain Registration":"Ndebanye aha ngalaba omenala","Form Submission":"Ntinye akwụkwọ","24/7 Support":"24/7 Nkwado","Online Appointments and Reminders (Business Working hours)":"Nhọpụta na ncheta n'ịntanetị (awa ọrụ azụmahịa)","Mon-Fri":"Mọnde-Fri","Mon-Sun":"Monday-Sun","Ecommerce Functionality":"Ọrụ ecommerce","Database Integration":"Njikọ database","Guidance and Analytics":"Ntuziaka na nyocha","Search Engine Optimization (SEO)":"Nchọcha Nchọcha (SEO)","Price Range":"Oke ọnụ ahịa","₦500,000+ in addition to recurrent costs (Note: Prices are subject to the complexity of the project and nature of the market)":"₦ 500,000 na mgbakwunye na ụgwọ ugboro ugboro (Cheta: Ọnụ ahịa na-adabere na mgbagwoju anya nke oru ngo na ọdịdị nke ahịa)","₦1million+ in addition to recurrent costs (Note: Prices are subject to the complexity of the project and nature of the market)":"₦ 1million na mgbakwunye na ụgwọ na-aga n'ihu (Cheta: Ọnụ ahịa na-adabere na mgbagwoju anya nke oru ngo na ọdịdị nke ahịa)","Try Basic Plan":"Gbalịa Atụmatụ Ndabere","Try Pro Plan":"Gbalịa atụmatụ Pro","OVER 4 YEARS IN THE FIELD":"Karịa afọ 4 n'ubi","About Us":"Gbasara anyị","Mission":"Ozi","Vision":"Ọhụụ","Welcome to Forkhive Limited, your number one source for Data Science, Machine Learning Artificial Intelligence and Web/Mobile services.":"Nnọọ na Forkhive Limited, isi mmalite gị nke mbụ maka Sayensị Sayensị, igwe mmụta Artificial Intelligence na ọrụ Weebụ/Mobile.","To drive innovation and technology that would stimulate the growth of African businesses.":"Ịchụba ihe ọhụrụ na teknụzụ ga-akpali uto nke azụmahịa ndị Africa.","We see a continent where innovation and technology are the driving force of business success.":"Anyị na-ahụ kọntinent ebe ihe ọhụrụ na nkà na ụzụ bụ ihe na-akpata ọganihu azụmahịa.","Founder and CEO":"Onye guzobere na CEO","Senior Frontend Software Engineer (React-TS, JS)":"Injinia Software Frontend Senior (React-TS, JS)","Benjamin Effiong is the Founder and CEO of Forkhive.
